The witch can feed on the fear of her victim. The target of this hex becomes shaken for a number of rounds equal to 3 + the witchâ€™s Intelligence modifier. As long as the witch remains within 30 feet of her target, she gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and a +1 morale bonus on saving throws as long as this effect persists.

A successful Will save reduces the duration of this hex to 1 round. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
